2: 2 large heirloom tomatoes, cut into wedges1 cup halved grape or Sun Gold tomatoes¼ cup fish sauce or thin soy sauce2 fresh bird’s eye chiles, or to taste, thinly sliced on an angle1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds1 tablespoon fried garlicHandful of mint leaves
3: In a medium bowl, lightly toss the tomatoes with the fish sauce and chiles. Let stand for 5 minutes or so at room temperature, then transfer to a plate or bowl and sprinkle with the sesame seeds and fried garlic. Garnish with the mint leaves.
